title: So Much News, So Little Time - 2026 World Cup & Bill Clinton's Dodgy Interview | Ian Bremmer
itunes:title: So Much News, So Little Time - 2026 World Cup & Bill Clinton's Dodgy Interview | Ian Bremmer
description:
Trevor dives into the latest barrage of headlines, Lewis Black rants about how U.S. schools are responding to mass shootings, and author Ian Bremmer discusses "Us vs. Them."
